prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a round body and a cute, playful expression.
I want a whimsical Pokemon with a light blue color scheme and oversized ears.
Generate a fairy-like creature that resembles a balloon and has a gentle demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that looks like it could float in the air and has a serene aura.
Imagine a Pokemon with a soft, rounded figure and a friendly personality.
Design a creature that is both enchanting and mysterious, with delicate features.
Show me a cozy-looking Pokemon that enjoys wandering through lush forests.
